column4: duma→ This sounds like a very interesting project. You mean something like kiosk-software?
kiosktool is what I can find from a quick repository search, duma - might I suggest you post about this on the forum?
stylin→ Removing the partitions with a LiveCD and merge the empty space with the 8.10 partition :)
that is my tentative plan, but i was wondering if there was something i had to do to GRUB as well ?
